template.template: Template App HAProxy by Zabbix agent
template.name: Template App HAProxy by Zabbix agent
template.description:
Get metrics from status page using Zabbix agent https://www.haproxy.com/blog/exploring-the-haproxy-stats-page/. Example configuration of HAProxy: frontend stats bind *:8404 stats enable stats uri /stats stats refresh 10s
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/393527-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-haproxy
Template tooling version used: 0.35

trigger.name: HAProxy: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: HAProxy version has changed. Ack to close.

trigger.name: HAProxy: Service response time is too high (over {$HAPROXY.RESPONSE_TIME.MAX.WARN} for 5m)

item.name: HAProxy: Get stats
item.description: HAProxy Statistics Report in CSV format

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Responses denied per second
item_prototype.description: Responses denied due to security concerns (ACL-restricted).

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Errors connection per second
item_prototype.description: Number of requests that encountered an error attempting to connect to a backend server.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Response errors per second
item_prototype.description: Number of requests whose responses yielded an error

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy backend {#PXNAME}: Number of responses with error is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_ERESP.MAX.WARN} for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Number of requests on backend, whose responses yielded an error, is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_ERESP.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Unassigned requests
item_prototype.description: Current number of requests unassigned in queue.

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy backend {#PXNAME}: Current number of requests unassigned in queue is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_QCUR.MAX.WARN} for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Current number of requests on backend unassigned in queue is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_QCUR.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Time in queue
item_prototype.description: Average time spent in queue (in ms) for the last 1,024 requests

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy backend {#PXNAME}: Average time spent in queue is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_QTIME.MAX.WARN} for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Average time spent in queue (in ms) for the last 1,024 requests is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_QTIME.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Responses time
item_prototype.description: Average backend response time (in ms) for the last 1,024 requests

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy backend {#PXNAME}: Average response time is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_RTIME.MAX.WARN} for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Average backend response time (in ms) for the last 1,024 requests is more than {$HAPROXY.BACK_RTIME.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Redispatched requests per second
item_prototype.description: Number of times a request was redispatched to a different backend.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Backend {#PXNAME}: Retried connections per second
item_prototype.description: Number of times a connection was retried.

graph_prototype.name: HAProxy: Backend {#PXNAME} Redispatched requests and retried connections per second

item.host: Template App HAProxy by Zabbix agent
Template App HAProxy by Zabbix agent

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Incoming traffic
item_prototype.description: Number of bits received by the frontend

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Outgoing traffic
item_prototype.description: Number of bits sent by the frontend

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Denied requests per second
item_prototype.description: Requests denied due to security concerns (ACL-restricted) per second.

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of requests denied is more than {$HAPROXY.FRONT_DREQ.MAX.WARN} for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Number of requests denied due to security concerns (ACL-restricted) is more than {$HAPROXY.FRONT_DREQ.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Request errors per second
item_prototype.description: Number of request errors per second.

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of request errors is more than {$HAPROXY.FRONT_EREQ.MAX.WARN} for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Number of request errors is more than {$HAPROXY.FRONT_EREQ.MAX.WARN}.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of responses with codes 1xx per second
item_prototype.description: Number of informational HTTP responses per second.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of responses with codes 2xx per second
item_prototype.description: Number of successful HTTP responses per second.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of responses with codes 3xx per second
item_prototype.description: Number of HTTP redirections per second.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of responses with codes 4xx per second
item_prototype.description: Number of HTTP client errors per second.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Number of responses with codes 5xx per second
item_prototype.description: Number of HTTP server errors per second.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Sessions rate
item_prototype.description: Number of sessions created per second

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Requests rate
item_prototype.description: HTTP requests per second

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Established sessions
item_prototype.description: The current number of established sessions.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Session limits
item_prototype.description: The most simultaneous sessions that are allowed, as defined by the maxconn setting in the frontend.

item_prototype.name: HAProxy Frontend {#PXNAME}: Session utilization
item_prototype.description: Percentage of sessions used (scur / slim * 100).

trigger_prototype.name: HAProxy frontend {#PXNAME}: Session utilization is more than {$HAPROXY.FRONT_SUTIL.MAX.WARN}% for 5m
trigger_prototype.description: Alerting on this metric is essential to ensure your server has sufficient capacity to handle all concurrent sessions. Unlike requests, upon reaching the session limit HAProxy will deny additional clients until resource consumption drops. Furthermore, if you find your session usage percentage to be hovering above 80%, it could be time to either modify HAProxyâ€™s configuration to allow more sessions, or migrate your HAProxy server to a bigger box.

macro.description: Maximum of responses with error on BACKEND for trigger expression.
Maximum number of requests on BACKEND unassigned in queue for trigger expression.
Maximum of average time spent in queue on BACKEND for trigger expression.
Maximum of average BACKEND response time for trigger expression.
The HAProxy maximum denied requests for trigger expression.
The HAProxy maximum number of request errors for trigger expression.
Maximum of session usage percentage on frontend for trigger expression.
The HAProxy stats page maximum response time in seconds for trigger expression.
Maximum of responses with error on server for trigger expression.
Maximum number of requests on server unassigned in queue for trigger expression.
Maximum of average time spent in queue on server for trigger expression.
Maximum of average server response time for trigger expression.
The path of HAProxy stats page.
The port of the HAProxy stats host or container.
The scheme of HAProxy stats page(http/https).
